mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alert WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0

SELECT alert_id AS id, alert_date AS alertDate, alert_msg AS alertMsg, is_read AS isRead, user_id AS userId, type_no AS typeNo, title FROM alert JOIN alert_type USING(type_no) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0 ORDER BY alert_date DESC
